website_summaries.verdict: This reusable gel eye mask is great for relaxation and relief from headaches, sinuses, or puffiness.
pros: You can either freeze this eye mask or microwave it for hot therapy
Filled with non-toxic, non-caustic, eco-friendly polyacrylate gel
Comes with a strap so the mask stays in place around your eyes
cons: The strap has Velcro, which might stick to your hair

customer_reviews.title: This was great for my eye surgery
customer_reviews.text: I had a small eye gel pack already but I wanted something to put on my eyes after surgery instead of leaky and freezing ice-packs. I put these in the freezer and moved to refrig to thaw a little before using. I padded/Dr instructions with gaze. I alternated between the two and had minimal swelling and DR was very pleased, he couldn't believe the results at my 2 week follow up. I am having another eye surgery after COVID19 and plan on using them again. I recommend them for any eye swelling.
customer_reviews.author: barbjvan

customer_reviews.title: while sturdy are glued together and so have a sharp edge
customer_reviews.text: Keep in mind this eye mask is made out of vinyl, and not a soft fabric. The seams, while sturdy are glued together and so have a sharp edge. It really hurts my nose and ears to wear it for too long. The only upside is that it does cool down and heat up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: L_T

customer_reviews.title: It Works, but It's Not Super Comfy
customer_reviews.text: I am a big eye mask girl and this one is not bad. It holds the cold for a lot longer than most, so I will start there. I was happy about that. However this one isn't as comfortable to wear to sleep for example. It's rigid and plastic is pokey, so it's not gentle like a cloth or rubber one might be. But the band itself is flat, so you can wear it when you lay down. Just watch out for the Velcro getting your hair.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Critelli

customer_reviews.title: Super durable & comfy & easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this one... I love that the outer covering is SUPER durable - it doesn’t take very long at all to freeze completely & it takes a good hour+ to de-thaw with use - DEF recommend!

customer_reviews.title: ... has kind of hard edges so not the most comfortable to wear
customer_reviews.text: This is just "okay" it is a lot stiffer then I thought it would be and has kind of hard edges so not the most comfortable to wear. It does get fairly warm in a glass of hot water and seems to work for my sons headaches.

customer_reviews.title: A relaxing approach to the treatment of dry eyes
customer_reviews.text: I have tried it only once, for the heating of the eyelid glands (meibomian glands). I can't say yet what effect it will have on the glands, but the relaxation with the warmed eye mask was wonderful. I will try wearing it when i go to bed for the relaxation alone. The effect, if any , on the glands will take a longer trial as expected.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable warm compression mask.

There are warm spots on the farthest outside edges, but after 20 seconds in the microwave then a few seconds rubbing the mask around before putting it on reduces the warm spot issues I had. It wears very comfortable and has a strong Velcro closure.

customer_reviews.text: Very nice heat/cold mask with strap. My husband has dry eye issues and was recommended as a potential help. Just like anything you heat in a microwave, be sure to massage the gel before applying to your eyes, as parts of the gel may have hot spots right out of the microwave. Would buy again.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend if you need to ice your eyes for any ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a lifesaver after my Mom had eyelid surgery. The mask the surgery center gave needed to be filled with actual ice cubes and water, and emptied after every use. This provided the same benefit without the mess or hassle. Highly recommend if you need to ice your eyes for any reason.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It's very easy to use. Just heat it in a microwave for 30 seconds, and the heat will last around 15 minutes. The only disadvantage is the Velcro, which may stick your hairs.
customer_reviews.author: JoJo Chien

customer_reviews.title: Be careful with a microwave.
customer_reviews.text: A very functional product at a reasonable price. Do be careful though if using a microwave. Sneak up on the right 'cooking' time since the gel will heat very quickly (only 15 seconds for me). Then knead the gel away from the outside edges before applying to your face--the gel is thin at the edges and heats faster and hotter. The adjustable strap is a prime feature here for the best fit.

customer_reviews.title: what it lacks in durability it makes for in explosions...

After a few weeks of use it seems 30 seconds turned into 27 seconds as the gel exploded at the 27 sec mark, causing the material to rip and gel covering the microwave. Prior to that it worked ok, but there would be extremely hot spots & extremely cold spots despite attempting to mix the gel around.

customer_reviews.title: so it's hard to get it to comfortably sit on the eyes
customer_reviews.text: It's okay for about 10 minutes or so, but after that really starts to feel heavy on your eyes. I had originally bought it thinking it could double as an eye mask for sleeping as well as heat for dry eyes, but it's way too heavy for sleeping in my opinion. I didn't expect the gel (or whatever it is) inside to be so thick, so it's hard to get it to comfortably sit on the eyes. If you're just looking for something to offer some quick relief, it's an okay product, but honestly will be looking for something lighter/thinner next time.. Also without the velcro strap, that hurts when it gets stuck in your hair!!

customer_reviews.title: I bought this mostly to cool my sad
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mostly to cool my sad, overworked eyes. I initially was pleased. But there are bewares ahead. product_meta.title: Inerzen Hot or Cold Eye Mask Gel Pad - Reusable, Microwavable, Freezable - Relief for Dry Eyes, Bruises, Puffy Swollen Eyes, Fatigue, Headache, Tension, and More
feature_bullets: Relief and Relaxation - Great for providing relief from headaches, fever, sinuses, puffiness, fatigue, soreness, dry eyes, allergies, and more.
Works Hot or Cold - Simply freeze in the fridge for cold therapy, or heat with hot water or a microwave for hot therapy. (Be sure to follow instructions for heating or cooling)
Durable and Safe - Reusable. Made from strong Nylon lining and filled with non-toxic, non-caustic, eco-friendly Polyacrylate Gel.
Easy to Use - Simply place over your eyes and adjust the fit with the soft quick fasten belt.
Backed by Inerzen - Product comes with a 1 year limited warranty. Simply contact Inerzen's fast and friendly support for details.
